page.title: 18TRANSPORT
page.content:
We conducted a survey on public transport in our area.We asked a hundred people these questions,
1.Do you use buses?
2.(a)Is there a reason why you dont use buses?(b)How often do you use buses?
3.Do you think that public transport gives you a good service?. ANSWERS 39% use buses,21% dont use buses.13% use a bus daily,21% use a bus once a week,18% use a bus 4 days a week and 23% use a bus once a month or less than once a month. 50% said that public transport gave them a good service,8% said that it gave them a fair service,15% said that it gave them a poor service
